resources.string: [[59343]] Unable to confirm your phone number
[[97083]] Sorry, we are having trouble sending you a confirmation code.
[[59337]] This code has expired. Please resend\ confirmation code.
[[59339]] Please check your network and try again.
[[100619]] By tapping %1$sSend confirmation code%1$s above, Digits by Twitter, will send you a SMS message to confirm your phone number. Message & data rates may apply.

[[97081]] By tapping %1$sCreate account%1$s above, you agree to the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Cookies Policy of Digits by Twitter, and that other users of this app can discover you by phone number and/or email.

[[99300]] By tapping %1$sSign in%1$s above, you agree to the updated Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Cookies Policy of Digits by Twitter, and that other users of %1$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.
[[59336]] Please check your code and try again.
[[59335]] Please check your number and try again.

[[97086]] We use Digits by Twitter to find more of your friends who use this app. When you tap Okay, we\'ll upload your address book to Digits by Twitter so that we can help you find users of %1$s that you know or help other users of %1$s find you.
[[94015]] You have previously set a 2-step verification code on digits.com
[[94022]] Get updates and other information from %1$s when you allow\ them access to your email on your Twitter account \@%2$s
